info.author: Bertrand Nouvel
info.description:
This wrapper is a new opencv wrapper.
Designed to be easier to use.
It can can do on the fly encapsulation / decapsulation of numpy arrays into
various types of OpenCv datatypes, such as images, matrices or C array.
Even if it has a small overload cost because of the encapsulation /
decapsulation of the image, the image data is not recopied, and the wrapper is
still efficient
info.keywords: opencv python cython numpy computer vision
info.name: opencv-cython
info.platform: Linux, Mac OS, intel x86, x86_64
